Testing LaTeX Support

Apr 26, 2025 1 min read
Categories: mathematics
Tags: test latex

Let’s test some LaTeX math:

Inline math: $E = mc^2$

Display math:

$ \nabla \times \vec{E} = -\frac{\partial \vec{B}}{\partial t} $

This is Maxwell’s equation in differential form.
